sentences.sContent: Build of your imaginings a bower in the wilderness ere you build a house within the city walls.
sentences.sContent_eng: Build of your imaginings a bower in the wilderness ere you build a house within the city walls.
sentences.sCn: 在你们建房于城墙内之前，先用你们的想像在旷野建一所凉亭。

sentences.sContent: To woo females, the males of 17 of the 20 known species of bowerbirds build structures—often resembling an arbor, or bower, with an artfully decorated platform.
sentences.sContent_eng: To woo females, the males of 17 of the 20 known species of bowerbirds build structures—often resembling an arbor, or bower, with an artfully decorated platform.
sentences.sCn: 在已知20种园丁鸟中，有17种会为了向雌性求爱而建造房屋——它们的建筑物常常很像凉亭，有装饰性的平台，设计精巧，技艺高超。

words.tran: 种植园或农场；酒徒充斥的街区
